QueryResult.text: SELECT i.id investment_id, cop_days_late_fct(i.schedule_finish, bd.finish_date, i.progress) days_late, cop_days_late_pct_fct(i.schedule_finish, bd.finish_date, i.schedule_start, i.schedule_finish, bd.start_date, bd.finish_date, i.progress) days_late_pct FROM inv_investments i LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_baseline_details bd ON i.id = bd.object_id AND bd.object_type IN ('APPLICATION', 'ASSET', 'OTHER', 'PRODUCT', 'PROJECT', 'SERVICE') AND bd.is_current = 1 WHERE 1=1
